smart_goals.description: Monitor blood pressure readings twice daily for the next 30 days and record the average systolic and diastolic readings per week. Keep the average weekly systolic reading below 120 mmHg and average weekly diastolic reading below 80 mmHg.
Reduce daily caloric intake by 500 calories and maintain the new diet for the next 6 months. Monitor weight weekly and aim to lose 1-2 pounds per week.
Take medications as prescribed for the next 12 weeks. Monitor blood sugar levels daily and aim to keep post-meal readings below 180 mg/dL and fasting readings below 120 mg/dL.
